element.name: sdidemux
element.description: Demultiplex SDI streams into raw audio and video
element.author: David Schleef <ds@schleef.org>

caps.name: src
caps.details: video/x-raw-yuv, format=(fourcc)UYVY, width=(int)720, height=(int)480, framerate=(fraction)30000/1001, interlaced=(boolean)true, pixel-aspect-ratio=(fraction)10/11, chroma-site=(string)mpeg2, color-matrix=(string)sdtv; video/x-raw-yuv, format=(fourcc)UYVY, width=(int)720, height=(int)576, framerate=(fraction)25/1, interlaced=(boolean)true, pixel-aspect-ratio=(fraction)12/11, chroma-site=(string)mpeg2, color-matrix=(string)sdtv

element.name: sdimux
element.description: Multiplex raw audio and video into SDI
element.author: David Schleef <ds@schleef.org>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: video/x-raw-yuv, format=(fourcc){ UYVY, v210 }, width=(int)720, height=(int)480, framerate=(fraction)30000/1001, interlaced=(boolean)true, pixel-aspect-ratio=(fraction)10/11, chroma-site=(string)mpeg2, color-matrix=(string)sdtv; video/x-raw-yuv, format=(fourcc){ UYVY, v210 }, width=(int)720, height=(int)576, framerate=(fraction)25/1, interlaced=(boolean)true, pixel-aspect-ratio=(fraction)12/11, chroma-site=(string)mpeg2, color-matrix=(string)sdtv
